section.name: Info
section.p: An info element the <module>, <project>, and <resource> elements. An info element captures a title and description of the enclosing entity.

tr.td: The title of the enclosing resource/project or module (optional).
A description of the enclosing element.

section.name: Example

p.i: Example info element within a project definition.

section.source:
<project name="dpml-metro-runtime" basedir="runtime"> <info title="Metro Container Runtime"> <description> DPML Component management platform runtime container. </description> </info>
...
</project>
